titles.title: Satellite Television Viewing Amendments

A bill to amend section 705 of the Communications Act of 1934 to provide for a 2-year moratorium on the encryption of satellite cable programming to allow for the development of marketing systems under the recent amendments made to such section, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Telecommunications and Finance.

bill.summary: 2/4/1987--Introduced. Satellite Television Viewing Amendments - Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to prohibit the encryption of satellite cable programming for two years after enactment of this Act.
